header.title: wxInitDialogEvent

description.p: A wxInitDialogEvent is sent as a dialog or panel is being initialised. Handlers for this event can transfer data to the window.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxInitDialogEventType to subscribe to events of this type.
